io.straas.android.sdk.circall

Interface CircallStream


  • public interface CircallStream
    CircallStream provides methods for CirCall stream related operation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getStreamId()
      Get the stream id associated with this CircallStream.
      com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Bitmap> getVideoFrame()
      Get current image frame from video stream.
      boolean isAudioEnabled()
      Whether the audio of this stream is enabled.
      boolean isLocalStream()
      Whether the stream is local stream or not.
      boolean isShowing()
      Whether the stream is currently showing on any renderers.
      boolean isVideoEnabled()
      Whether the video of this stream is enabled.
      com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean> switchCamera()
      Switch to another camera.
      boolean toggleCamera()
      Toggle camera.
      boolean toggleMic()
      Toggle microphone.

    • Method Detail

      • isLocalStream

        boolean isLocalStream()
        Whether the stream is local stream or not.
        Returns:
        true if local stream.

        Whether the stream is currently showing on any renderers.
        Returns:
        true if showing.

        Returns:
        stream id.

        Switch to another camera.
        Returns:
        true if operation successes.

      • toggleCamera

        boolean toggleCamera()
        Toggle camera.
        Returns:
        true if the camera is on.

      • toggleMic

        boolean toggleMic()
        Toggle microphone.
        Returns:
        true if the microphone is on.

      • isVideoEnabled

        boolean isVideoEnabled()
        Whether the video of this stream is enabled.
        Returns:

      • isAudioEnabled

        Returns:
